mapper.insert: insert into board values(null,#{title},#{contents},0,now(), (select ifnull(max(g_no),0)+1 from board as b), 1,0,#{userNo})
mapper.select: select a.no, title, contents, hit, reg_date as regDate , g_no as gNo, o_no as Ono, depth, user_no as userNo, name as userName from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by g_no DESC, o_no ASC limit #{p},5
select a.no, title, contents, hit, g_no as gNo, o_no as oNo, depth, user_no as userNo, b.name from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and a.no=#{no}
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, reg_date=now() where no=#{no}
update board set o_no=o_no+1 where g_no = #{gNo} and o_no >= #{oNo}+1
mapper.select: select a.no, title, contents, hit, reg_date, g_no, o_no, depth, user_no, name from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and title like #{keyword} order by g_no DESC, o_no ASC limit #{p},5
select count(*) from board where title like #{keyword}
mapper.update: update board set hit=hit+1 where no=#{no}
